message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its unique features and benefits, we believe it is worth more than $1200000 to us. Given its exceptional quality and the value it offers, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1500000. This is a limited-time offer, and we encourage you to consider the significant savings and advantages this purchase would provide. We look forward to your response.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe it's a fair price considering the features and benefits you mentioned.
